rows: The array of paths to the main object's primary column. If you use filters, join them using theORoperator.
The way to save the records. Thewaysto save the records are as follows:Save the records to a single binding.Create a binding per each record bound to the main object record via the filter.
The list of columns to bind.
The list of nested objects’ structures. For example, details connected to the main object.
The list of structures on which the current structure depends. For example, lookups to which the record in the current structure links via lookup fields.
html:
Property

Description

EntitySchemaName

The name of the object.

FilterColumnPaths

The array of paths to the main object's primary column. If you use filters, join them using the OR operator.

IsBundle

The way to save the records. The ways to save the records are as follows:

  • Save the records to a single binding.
  • Create a binding per each record bound to the main object record via the filter.

Columns

The list of columns to bind.

InnerStructures

The list of nested objects’ structures. For example, details connected to the main object.

DependsStructures

The list of structures on which the current structure depends. For example, lookups to which the record in the current structure links via lookup fields.
